title: The Girl From Frisco
description: They were gunning for Mercedes McCall!A stroke of luck had made Mercedes co-owner of a stagecoach line. But a band of saddle bumps wanted her share. And if bullets didn't get her, there were other ways to smash a beautiful young girl! One man, Owen Gilroy, set out to save her â€” even if it meant a lone gun against the whole town's hardware.
author: William Heuman
